channel.title: How to run king pk source offline on my mac?
channel.description:
i dont care if it has bugs, just wondering ow ot run it offline for my own personal play.
i tried terminal using the same method as noobscape v3, but it doesnt work.
anyone have a sulution?

item.title: How to run king pk source offline on my mac?
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

cleako:

It requires a mysql server with a populated database to be set up and running to connect to. Noobscape saves player data as text files so none is needed. You will have to set everything up in order to access kingpk. Play with XAMPP for OSX to get a quick and easy mysql server set up locally and use apache webserver that is built in to access http://localhost/phpmyadmin to access your mysql database for creating and importing the kingpk database. https://www.apachefriends.org/download.html

yeah, i remember a guy saying something about that when i wanted an offline source running for myself, this was b4 i had noobscape v3. so yeah, good to know, i dont need it anyways. thanks though.

Read full topic
item.source: How to run king pk source offline on my mac?

Play with XAMPP for OSX to get a quick and easy mysql server set up locally and use apache webserver that is built in to access http://localhost/phpmyadmin to access your mysql database for creating and importing the kingpk database. https://www.apachefriends.org/download.html
